content.text:
# List of community currencies in the United Kingdom

This article is a list of community currencies that are, or have been, used in the United Kingdom. There are various models such as complementary currencies, local currencies, Local Exchange Trading Systems (LETS) and Time-based currency:
{|class="wikitable sortable"
!Started
!Currency
!Status
!Comment
!Organisations
!Model
!Website
|-
| 2012
| Bristol pound
| Defunct 2021
|Active for 9 years.
| Bristol Pound Community CIC,  Bristol Credit Union, Bristol City Council
| Local currency
| [https://bristolpound.org/ bristolpound.org]
|-
| 2008
| Brixton pound
|
|In 2021, there was a plan to convert to cryptocurrency, partnering with Algorand.
| Transition Town Brixton, Brixton Pound
| Local currency
| [https://brixtonpound.org/ brixtonpound.org]
|-
| 2002
| Eko
| Active
| Currency of Findhorn Ecovillage, Moray, Scotland
| Ekopia,  Hygeia Foundation
| Community currency
|
|-
| 2015
| Exeter pound
| Defunct 2018
|Active for 3 years.
| Exeter Pound CIC
| Local currency
| [https://www.exeterpound.org.uk/ exeterpound.org.uk]
|-
| 2014
| Kingston Pound
| Active
| Digital only, no paper currency.
| Transition Town Kingston
| Local currency
| [https://kingstonpound.org/ kingstonpound.org]
|-
| 2008
| Lewes pound
| Active
|Set to be phased out on 31 August, 2025
| Transition Town Lewes
| Local currency
| [https://www.thelewespound.org/ thelewespound.org]
|-
| 2018
| Lake District pound
| Defunct 2020
| Active for 2 years.
|  Lakes Currency Project
| Regional currency
| [https://www.lakedistrictpound.com lakedistrictpound.com]
|-
| n/a
| Oxford pound
| Not launched
| Initial plan was not successful in 2013. In 2017, a Green Party councillor put a new proposal forward to the council.
|
| Local currency
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20160328042548/http://www.oxfordpound.org.uk/ oxfordpound.org.uk (archive)]
|-
| 2009
| Stroud pound
| Defunct 2016
| Active for 7 years.
| Transition Town Stroud, Stroud Pound Co-op
| Local currency
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20150405112423/http://www.stroudpound.org.uk/ stroudpound.org.uk (archive)]
|-
| 2007
| Totnes pound
| Defunct 2019
| Active for 12 years.
| Transition Town Totnes
| Local currency
| [http://www.totnespound.org/ totnespound.org]
|}
